Interesting Things
This guy is playing my favorite Scott Joplin Rag (Pine Apple Rag), and he's doing it on an /accordion/. It's so good! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EOUdwurfvxY This is a video of acrobatic gymnastics. It looks both painful and dangerous: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hhJyCbc8nGk Also this is the video where I learned how to juggle Mill's Mess! I learned this a forever ago and I found it again and I totally forgot about it. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N1NmNTlWRCU
